arts.ttl: Coventry thump five past sorry Sheffield Wednesday to go top of Championship
arts.sum: Brandon Thomas-Asante scored a first-half brace as Coventry eased to a 5-0 Championship victory away to struggling Sheffield Wednesday that sent them top of the table.

arts.ttl: Sheffield Wednesday 0-5 Coventry City: Sky Blues go top of Championship
arts.sum: Coventry City go top of the Championship after thumping Sheffield Wednesday in a game that is briefly held up by protesting home fans.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Sheffield Wednesday vs Coventry SUSPENDED after pitch invasion protest
arts.sum: Sheffield Wednesday supporters invaded the pitch after 10 minutes of their Championship clash with Coventry City, in protest against the much-maligned owner Dejphon Chansiri

arts.ttl: Brown starts: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face Coventry City
arts.sum: The latest Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI as Henrik Pedersen's side gear up to face Coventry City in the Championship. The post Brown starts: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face Coventry City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
